content.rendered:
Directed by Mari Selvaraj

Written by Mari Selvaraj

Cast Dhanush(Karnan). Lal(Yeman). Rajisha Vijayan(Draupathi). Yogi Babu(Vadamalaiyaan). Nataraja Subramanian(Kannapiran). Gouri Kishan(Kokila). Lakshmi Priyaa Chandramouli(Padmini). G.M. Kumar(Dhuriyodhanan). Shanmugarajan(Abhimanyu (as Shanmugha Rajan)). ‘Poo’ Ram(Karnan’s father). Subatra(Karnan’s mother). Azhagam Perumal(Evil villager). Akila(Village Female). Deepa Baskar(Village Female).Madhan Kumar Dhakshinamoorthy. Dharshini(Village Female).Md Ariful Islam.Janaki. Prabu(Police Officer). Vallinayagam(Uiynkattan)

Language Tamil

Producers Kalaippuli S. Thanu.

Production V. Creations. Vvproduction
